text: Tamagra Benzameni nagamota Jerusalemi kumapintira atiramita atreta freho. Hagi Tekoa kumatetira ufena nerenke'za, Bet-hakeremi kumatetira mago avame zana inuna kreta resu nehinke'za nege'za vahe'mo'za korora fre'za ome zamagura vaziho. Na'ankure noti kazigati hankave sondia vahe neazanki'za knazana eme tamiza tamazeri havizantfa hugahaze.
